name: LANDER Tire Air Deflator Valve - Short
description: Effortless Tire Deflation. The LANDER Tire Air Deflator Valve provides an efficient and hassle-free way to deflate your tires. Unlike traditional methods, this deflator valve allows you to release air without removing the valve core, streamlining the process and saving you valuable time and effort.

specifications.compatibility: Most rim sizes, trucks, SUVs, and off-road vehicles

name: LANDER Tire Air Deflator Valve - Long
description: Quick & Efficient Inflation. With the LANDER Tire Deflator Valve, you can quickly lower tire pressure from 35 PSI to 15 PSI in less than 15 seconds. This rapid air release is perfect for off-road enthusiasts who need to adjust tire pressure efficiently on the go, allowing for quicker setup and more time to enjoy your adventure.

specifications.compatibility: Most rim sizes, trucks, SUVs, and off-road vehicles

name: LANDER Valve Cap
description: Protect your valve stems with the LANDER Valve Cap. Designed for durability and easy installation, these valve caps ensure your tire valves remain clean and free from debris.
